name: Noiz
description: Noiz is an AI-powered platform that generates concise summaries of YouTube videos and PDFs to enhance learning and productivity.
longDescription: Noiz.io is an AI-driven tool designed to simplify the consumption of long-form content by providing fast, accurate summaries of YouTube videos and PDF documents. Leveraging advanced AI models like ChatGPT, it extracts key insights from videos and texts, saving users time and boosting efficiency. The platform supports a wide range of content, including educational videos, podcasts, and research papers, making it ideal for students, professionals, and content creators. Noiz operates through a user-friendly Chrome extension and mobile apps, requiring no account for basic usage. Its mission is to help users stay informed in a content-saturated world by delivering digestible highlights without missing essential details.
features: Generates concise AI-powered summaries of YouTube videos in seconds, enabling users to grasp key points without watching entire videos.
Transforms YouTube videos into readable text with timestamped summaries for quick reference and easy navigation.
Summarizes PDF documents of any length into customizable formats like bullet points, Q&A, or essays, ideal for research and study.
Supports summaries in 41 languages, making content accessible to a global audience.
Processes videos up to 12 hours long, suitable for summarizing short clips or lengthy courses.
Offers a free plan with unlimited PDF summaries and limited daily YouTube video summaries, requiring no registration.
Provides mobile apps for Android and iOS, allowing users to generate summaries on the go.
Ensures user privacy by deleting uploaded files immediately after summarization without tracking activity.

faqs.question: What types of content can Noiz summarize?
faqs.answer: Noiz can summarize YouTube videos, including podcasts, and PDF documents, covering any subject or length.

faqs.question: Is Noiz free to use?
faqs.answer: Yes, Noiz offers a free plan with unlimited PDF summaries and up to three YouTube video summaries per day, with no registration required.

faqs.question: Does Noiz support multiple languages?
faqs.answer: Yes, Noiz can generate and translate summaries in 41 languages, catering to a global audience.

faqs.question: Can Noiz summarize my own YouTube videos?
faqs.answer: Yes, Noiz works with any public or unlisted YouTube video, including content youâ€™ve created.

faqs.question: How long can videos be for Noiz to summarize?
faqs.answer: Noiz can process YouTube videos up to 12 hours long, from short clips to multi-hour courses.

faqs.question: Is registration required to use Noiz?
faqs.answer: No, Noiz allows anonymous usage for PDF summaries and limited video summaries without requiring an account.

faqs.question: What formats are available for PDF summaries?
faqs.answer: Noiz offers customizable PDF summary formats, including bullet points, Q&A, or essay styles, with adjustable lengths.

faqs.question: Does Noiz store my uploaded files?
faqs.answer: No, Noiz deletes uploaded files immediately after summarization to ensure user privacy.
